mapper.select: SELECT ca.cartid, ca.userid, c.username As user_name, ca.itemid, i.itemname AS item_name, i.itemprice AS item_price, ca.amount, (ca.amount * i.itemprice) AS total_price FROM cart ca INNER JOIN item i ON ca.itemid = i.itemid INNER JOIN cust c ON ca.userid = c.userid WHERE ca.cartid=#{cartid}

SELECT ca.cartid, ca.userid, c.username As user_name, ca.itemid, i.itemname AS item_name, i.itemprice AS item_price, ca.amount, (ca.amount * i.itemprice) AS total_price FROM cart ca INNER JOIN item i ON ca.itemid = i.itemid Inner JOIN cust c ON ca.userid = c.userid
WHERE ca.userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET itemid=#{itemid}, amount=#{amount} WHERE cartid=#{cartid}
